record.field: Hi, if you need help with your database, feel free to contact our support via http://www.viindoo.com/ticket
Yes, of course, you can find it here: https://viindoo.com/documentation/16.0/applications.html
I was wondering if Viindoo has an application to easily manage social media for my business..
Hello Joel Willis, you're at the right place! You can customize Viindoo using our Studio application in just a few clicks.
